Table 1: Comparison of our proposed adaptive negative sampling (PADS) against common static negative sampling strategies: 
semihard negative mining[38] (semihard) and static distance-based sampling (U-dist)[60] using triplet[49] and margin loss[60]. 
ReImp. denotes our re-implementations and Dim the dimensionality of ?.
